name: Win That War!
description: Win That War! is a massive scale real-time strategy game, putting thousands of players at the heart of a single campaign of fierce galactic conquest. Discover new planets. Develop your arsenal. Strive to be the best to extend the domination of your corporation.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows (64bits only) 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 Processor: Core i3 5th generation / i5 3nd generation Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 10 dedicated GPU DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: 5.1 support available Additional Notes: UHD support available
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows (64bits only) 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 Processor: Core i5 4th generation Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia GTX 660 / AMD R9 2xx DirectX: Version 10 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: 5.1 support available Additional Notes: UHD support available
